results.content: An excellent course that focuses on developing a simple (at first) php game. However, while coding the game, other technologies (BootStrap, CSS, Javascript, and jQuery) are incorporated to improve functionality and the user interface. An additional benefit of this course is the author’s logical approach. The code is organized in a modular fashion and there are many examples of code optimization.

response.content: Thank you for your review, John. I am glad that you enjoyed the course.
response.content_html: Thank you for your review, John. I am glad that you enjoyed the course.
